待解决的问题

1 多张表通过 left join 查询会出现表中数据null的情况

1.1 如何在设计表的时候设定默认值?

1.2 当表设计好了而又没有设计默认值，如何通过C#代码的SqlDataReader reader的reader[“属性”] 访问而造成因为null值而发生异常

2 当使用DataGridView控件显示数据时，数据量过大时，如何分页显示？

3 当使用数据库查询数据出现异常时，是否需要每一层都要捕捉异常再从里面一层一层地往外抛?还是只在UI层哪里使用了就在哪里捕捉?

4  当修改学员信息时，由于身份证是唯一的，不允许存在相同，有可能不修改身份证号，也有可能修改，但修改身份证前，修改后的身份证号不能与数据库其它学员的身份证相同，当存在相同时，给出提示信息，如何判断？

5  当需要更新某个表时，有视图引用该表，而该视图却利用该表的相关字段进行比较得出相应的字段，比如视图利用表的最大库存、最小库存和现在库存进行比较得出视图的描述字段 “高于库存”、”低于库存”、”库存正常”，更新时，如何顺带更新视图

 

1.1   答案

  alter  table  SalesListDetail  add  constraint  df_Discount  default(0)  for  Discount

   其中SalesListDetail为表名，df_Discount为约束名称，为字段Discount设置默认值为0

1.2 答案

 

4 答案

这时查询需要增加学号，查询当前身份证与不是当前学号的记录数是否大于0，大于0则修改后的身份证号与其它学员的身份证相同

 

5答案

使用存储过程和事务更新库存时同时编译视图，

使用execute  sp_refreshview  view_QueryInventoryInfo   其中view_QueryInventoryInfo为视图名称

代码如下：

if exists(select * from sysobjects where name='usp_UpdateProductInventory')

drop procedure usp_UpdateProductInventory

go

create procedure usp_UpdateProductInventory

@ProductId varchar(50),

@TotalCount int,

@MinCount int,

@MaxCount int

as

         declare @errorSum int

         set @errorSum=0

         begin transaction

           begin

                   --修改当前库存

                   update ProductInventory set TotalCount=@TotalCount where ProductId=@ProductId

                   set @errorSum=@@error+@errorSum

                   --修改最小库存

                   update ProductInventory set MinCount=@MinCount  where ProductId=@ProductId

                   set @errorSum=@@error+@errorSum

                   --修改最大库存

                   update ProductInventory set MaxCount=@MaxCount  where ProductId=@ProductId

                   set @errorSum=@@error+@errorSum

                   --修改库存的状态id,库存状态（1：正常，-1：低于库存，2：高于库存；-2：已清仓）

                   update ProductInventory set StatusId=case

                            when  TotalCount>MaxCount then 2

                            when TotalCount>0 and TotalCount<MinCount then -1

                            when TotalCount=0 then -2

                            when TotalCount>MinCount and TotalCount<MaxCount then 1

                   end

                   --重新编译与库存相关的视图

                   execute  sp_refreshview view_QueryInventoryInfo

                   set @errorSum=@@error+@errorSum

 

                   if(@errorSum=0)

                            commit transaction

                   else

                            rollback transaction

           end

go

--创建数据库

create database StudentManageDB

on primary

(

              --数据库文件的逻辑名

    name='StudentManageDB_data',

    --数据库物理文件名（绝对路径）

    filename='D:\DB\StudentManageDB_data.mdf',

    --数据库文件初始大小

    size=10MB,

    --数据文件增长量

    filegrowth=1MB

)

--创建日志文件

log on

(

    name='StudentManageDB_log',

    filename='D:\DB\StudentManageDB_log.ldf',

    size=2MB,

    filegrowth=1MB

)

go

if exists(select * from sysobjects where name='fk_StudentId')

主界面

登录界面切换到主界面的业务逻辑

 

1 创建登录窗体，判断登录窗体点击的返回结果是否为OK，如果为OK则创建主窗体，代码如下：

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Linq;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

using System.Windows.Forms;

 

namespace StudentManager

{

    static class Program

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 应用程序的主入口点。

        /// </summary>

        [STAThread]

        static void Main()

        {

            Application.EnableVisualStyles();

            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);

            //创建登录窗体

            FrmUserLogin objFrmLogin = new FrmUserLogin();

            //在这里代码堵塞，直到登录窗体返回结果为OK

            DialogResult result = objFrmLogin.ShowDialog();

 

            //判断登录是否成功

            if (result == DialogResult.OK)

            {

                Application.Run(new FrmMain());

            }

            else

            {

                Application.Exit();  //退出整个程序

            }

           

        }

    }

}

 

2 编写登录窗体的登录按钮的业务代码如下：

 private void btnLogin_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            //[1]数据验证

            if(this.txtLoginId.Text.Trim().Length==0){

                MessageBox.Show("请输入登录账号!","登录提示");

                this.txtLoginId.Focus();

                return;

            }

 

            if (this.txtLoginPwd.Text.Trim().Length == 0)

            {

                MessageBox.Show("请输入登录密码!", "登录提示");

                this.txtLoginPwd.Focus();

                return;

            }

 

            //[2]封装对象

            SysAdmin objAdmin = new SysAdmin() {

                LoginId=Convert.ToInt32(this.txtLoginId.Text.Trim()),

                LoginPwd=this.txtLoginPwd.Text.Trim()

            };

            //[3] 和后台交互,判断登录信息是否正确

            try

            {

                objAdmin=objAdminService.AdminLogin(objAdmin);    //校验数据库业务逻辑

                if (objAdmin != null)

                { //登录成功

                    Program.objCurrentAdmin = objAdmin;

                    //设置登录窗体的返回值

                    this.DialogResult = DialogResult.OK;

                    //关闭窗体

                    this.Close();

                }

                else {

                    MessageBox.Show("登录账号或密码错误","登录提示");

                }

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                MessageBox.Show("数据访问出现异常,登录失败!具体原因："+ex.Message);

            }

        }

 

改善用户体验

改善一：

输入完登录账户后，按下回车键，直接跳转到登录密码框，使其获取焦点

步骤：

找到登录账户框的KeyDown事件，双击鼠标，编辑事件函数如下：

//改善用户体验,在登录账户输入回车键跳转到密码框，使密码框获取焦点

        private void txtLoginId_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)

        {

           if(e.KeyValue==13){  //键盘按下回车键

               if (this.txtLoginId.Text.Trim().Length != 0)

               {

                   //密码框获取焦点

                   this.txtLoginPwd.Focus();

               }

           } 

}

改善二：

输入完登录密码后，按下回车键代替点击登录按钮

步骤：

找到密码登录框的KeyDown事件函数，编辑事件函数如下：

 //改善用户体验,输入完密码后按回车键代替点击登录按钮

        private void txtLoginPwd_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)

        {

            if(e.KeyValue==13){  //按下回车键

                btnLogin_Click(null, null);  //调用点击登录按钮事件函数

            }

        }

 

添加学员界面

 

解决窗体重复创建问题

问题描述：

当多次点击添加新学员按钮时，就创建一个窗体，就会出现创建多个窗体的情况，如下图：

解决方案：

利用窗体对象静态化，当窗体对象为null时就进行new窗体，当窗体已经存在了，就进行激活和正常显示，当窗体关闭后，把窗体对象设置为null

下面以在点击主窗体的添加学员按钮弹出添加学员窗体为例进行说明：

 

 

1 主窗体的添加学员按钮的点击事件函数编辑如下：

       public static FrmAddStudent objFrmAddStudent = null;  //添加学员窗体静态化

        private void tsbAddStudent_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            if (objFrmAddStudent == null)

            {

                objFrmAddStudent = new FrmAddStudent();

                objFrmAddStudent.Show();

            }

            else {

                objFrmAddStudent.Activate();   //激活窗体

                objFrmAddStudent.WindowState = FormWindowState.Normal; //正常显示

            }

          

        }

 

2 找到添加学员的窗体的FormClosed事件，双击并编辑如下：

using System.Threading.Tasks;

using System.Windows.Forms;

 

namespace StudentManager

{

    public partial class FrmAddStudent : Form

    {

        public FrmAddStudent()

        {

            InitializeComponent();

        }

 

        //窗体已经关闭

        private void FrmAddStudent_FormClosed(object sender, FormClosedEventArgs e)

        {

            //当窗体关闭时，将窗体对象清理掉

            FrmMain.objFrmAddStudent = null;

        }

    }

}

 

 

编写数据验证通用类

 

数据验证类如下：

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

 

using System.Text.RegularExpressions;

 

namespace StudentManager.Common

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 通用验证类

    /// </summary>

    class DataValidate

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 验证正整数

        /// </summary>    

        public static bool IsInteger(string txt)

        {

            Regex objReg = new Regex(@"^[1-9]\d*$");

            return objReg.IsMatch(txt);

        }

        /// <summary>

        /// 验证是否是Email

        /// </summary>    

        public static bool IsEmail(string txt)

        {

            Regex objReg = new Regex(@"\w+([-+.]\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*");

            return objReg.IsMatch(txt);

        }

        /// <summary>

        /// 验证身份证

        /// </summary>    

        public static bool IsIdentityCard(string txt)

        {

            Regex objReg = new Regex(@"^(\d{15}$|^\d{18}$|^\d{17}(\d|X|x))$");

            return objReg.IsMatch(txt);

        }

        //...其他正则表达式的验证，请学员自己根据所给正则表达式自己添加相应的方法

 

 

 

    }

}

 

 

 

程序退出设计

在窗体关闭事件发生前，会触发窗体的FormClosing事件，不管是使用this.Close()方法或者是直接点击窗体右上角的×关闭窗体，都会在关闭前触发FormClosing事件

 

 

班级下拉框数据的绑定(从数据库读取绑定)

SQLHelper类：

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Configuration;   //引入读取配置文件的命名空间

using System.Data;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    public class SQLHelper

    {

        //解密

        public static string connString =StudentManager.Common.StringSecurity.DESDecrypt(

            ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["connString"].ToString());

        public static int Update(string sql) {

            SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString);

            SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql,conn);

            try

            {

                conn.Open();

                return cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                //将错误信息写入日志

                throw ex;

            }

            finally {

                conn.Close();

            }

           

        }

 

        /// <summary>

        /// 执行单一结果

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="sql"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public static object GetSingleResult(string sql) {

 

            SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString);

            SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql, conn);

            try

            {

                conn.Open();

                return cmd.ExecuteScalar();

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                //将错误信息写入日志

                throw ex;

            }

            finally

            {

                conn.Close();

            }

        }

 

        /// <summary>

        /// 执行结果集的查询

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="sql"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public static SqlDataReader GetReader(string sql) {

            SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString);

            SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql, conn);

            try

            {

                conn.Open();

                return cmd.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.CloseConnection);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                conn.Close();

                //将错误信息写入日志

                throw ex;

            }

           

        }

    }

}

 

新增：事务

/// <summary>

        /// 启用事务同时提交多条SQL语句

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="sqlList">sql语句集合</param>

        /// <returns>返回bool类型，代表执行是否成功</returns>

        public static bool UpdateByTran(List<string> sqlList) {

            SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString);

            SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand();

            cmd.Connection = conn;

            try

            {

                conn.Open();

                //开启事务

                cmd.Transaction = conn.BeginTransaction();

 

                foreach (string itemSql in sqlList)

                {

                    cmd.CommandText = itemSql;

                    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();

                }

                //提交数据

                cmd.Transaction.Commit();

                return true;

            }

            catch (SqlException ex)

            {

                //回滚

                if(cmd.Transaction!=null){

                    cmd.Transaction.Rollback(); //事务回滚

                }

                throw ex;

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                throw ex;

            }

            finally {

                //清空事务

                if(cmd.Transaction!=null){

                    cmd.Transaction = null;

                }

                //关闭数据库

                conn.Close();

            }

        }

班级数据访问类：StudentClassService

 

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 班级数据访问类

    /// </summary>

    public class StudentClassService

    {

        public List<StudentClass> GetAllClass() {

            string sql = "select ClassName,ClassId from StudentClass";

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            List<StudentClass> list = new List<StudentClass>();

            while(reader.Read()){

                StudentClass objStudentClass = new StudentClass();

                objStudentClass.ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString();

                objStudentClass.ClassId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["ClassId"].ToString());

                list.Add(objStudentClass);

            }

            reader.Close();

            return list;

        }

    }

}

    {

        public FrmAddStudent()

        {

            InitializeComponent();

            //初始化班级下拉框

            try

            {

                //绑定实体类对象集合

                this.cboClassName.DataSource = objClassService.GetAllClass();

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                MessageBox.Show("操作失败,原因为:"+ex.Message);

            }

            //设置下拉框显示的值(实体类对象的那个属性对于的值,显示在前台的属性的值)

            this.cboClassName.DisplayMember = "ClassName";

            //设置下拉框的键(实体类对应的ID)

            this.cboClassName.ValueMember = "ClassId";

 

        }

    }

}

数据库操作访问类：(其中SQLHelper类参考前面)

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 学员信息数据访问类

    /// </summary>

    public class StudentService

    {

        #region 查询学员

        /// <summary>

        /// 根据班级名称查询学员信息

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="className"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public List<StudentExt> GetStudentByClass(string className)

        {

            string sql = "select StudentName,StudentId,Gender,Birthday,ClassName from Students  ";

            sql += "inner join StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId";

            sql += "  where ClassName='{0}'";

            sql = string.Format(sql, className);

 

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            List<StudentExt> list = new List<StudentExt>();

            while (reader.Read())

            {

                list.Add(new StudentExt()

                {

                    StudentName = reader["StudentName"].ToString(),

                    StudentId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["StudentId"].ToString()),

                    Gender = reader["Gender"].ToString(),

                    Birthday = Convert.ToDateTime(reader["Birthday"].ToString()),

                    ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString()

 

                });

            }

            reader.Close();

            return list;

        }

        #endregion

    }

}

鼠标双击事件

应用场景：

鼠标双击DataGridView查询出来的数据的某一行，然后弹出当前学员的详细信息窗口，如下图：

步骤：

找到DataGridView控件的CellDoubleClick事件，双击进去，然后编辑该事件的代码如下：

  //DataGridView单元格鼠标双击事件(弹出学员详细信息对话框)

        private void dgvStudentList_CellDoubleClick(object sender, DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)

        {

            //数据验证

            if (this.dgvStudentList.CurrentRow==null)

            {

                MessageBox.Show("当前单元格数据为0行","提示信息");

                return;

            }

 

            //获取学员的id号

            string studentId = this.dgvStudentList.CurrentRow.Cells["StudentId"].Value.ToString();

            //把学员的id放入输入学号的文本框中，方便调用根据学号查询按钮的点击事件

            this.txtStudentId.Text = studentId;  

            btnQueryById_Click(null,null);

               

        }

/// <summary>

    /// 按照姓名降序排列

    /// </summary>

    public class NameDesc:IComparer<StudentExt>

    {

 

        public int Compare(StudentExt x, StudentExt y)

        {

            return y.StudentName.CompareTo(x.StudentName);

        }

}

窗体的ShowDialog和Show的区别

使用ShowDialog弹出的窗体，在当前窗体显示时，不能同时操作别的窗体，如果点击它父类窗体，则发出一声报警声’叮’，同时该窗体会抖动几下并高亮显示，必须关闭了当前窗体才能操作别的窗体，

而使用Show则没有这样的要求

加密解密类

using System;

using System.Text;

using System.IO;

using System.Security.Cryptography;

 

namespace StudentManager.Common

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 字符串加密解密类

    /// </summary>

    public sealed class StringSecurity

    {

        private StringSecurity() { }

 

        #region SHA1 加密

 

        /// <summary>

        /// 使用SHA1加密字符串。

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="inputString">输入字符串。</param>

        /// <returns>加密后的字符串。（40个字符）</returns>

        public static string StringToSHA1Hash(string inputString)

        {

            SHA1CryptoServiceProvider sha1 = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider();

            byte[] encryptedBytes = sha1.ComputeHash(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(inputString));

            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();

            for (int i = 0; i < encryptedBytes.Length; i++)

            {

                sb.AppendFormat("{0:x2}", encryptedBytes[i]);

            }

            return sb.ToString();

        }

 

        #endregion

 

        #region DES 加密/解密

 

        private static byte[] key = ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes("uiertysd");

        private static byte[] iv = ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes("99008855");

 

        /// <summary>

        /// DES加密。

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="inputString">输入字符串。</param>

        /// <returns>加密后的字符串。</returns>

        public static string DESEncrypt(string inputString)

        {

            MemoryStream ms = null;

            CryptoStream cs = null;

            StreamWriter sw = null;

 

            DESCryptoServiceProvider des = new DESCryptoServiceProvider();

            try

            {

                ms = new MemoryStream();

                cs = new CryptoStream(ms, des.CreateEncryptor(key, iv), CryptoStreamMode.Write);

                sw = new StreamWriter(cs);

                sw.Write(inputString);

                sw.Flush();

                cs.FlushFinalBlock();

                return Convert.ToBase64String(ms.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)ms.Length);

            }

            finally

            {

                if (sw != null) sw.Close();

                if (cs != null) cs.Close();

                if (ms != null) ms.Close();

            }

        }

 

        /// <summary>

        /// DES解密。

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="inputString">输入字符串。</param>

        /// <returns>解密后的字符串。</returns>

        public static string DESDecrypt(string inputString)

        {

            MemoryStream ms = null;

            CryptoStream cs = null;

            StreamReader sr = null;

 

            DESCryptoServiceProvider des = new DESCryptoServiceProvider();

            try

            {

                ms = new MemoryStream(Convert.FromBase64String(inputString));

                cs = new CryptoStream(ms, des.CreateDecryptor(key, iv), CryptoStreamMode.Read);

                sr = new StreamReader(cs);

                return sr.ReadToEnd();

            }

            finally

            {

                if (sr != null) sr.Close();

                if (cs != null) cs.Close();

                if (ms != null) ms.Close();

            }

        }

 

        #endregion

    }

}

 

 

 

DAL层

SQLHelper类参考前面

 

SysAdminService类：

注意：该类中的登录方法中的sql语句会发生sql注入的危险(亲测试过 )

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 管理员数据访问类

    /// </summary>

    public class SysAdminService

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 根据登录账号和密码登录

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="objAdmin">封装了登录账号和密码的管理员对象</param>

        /// <returns>返回包含管理员信息的对象</returns>

        public SysAdmin AdminLogin(SysAdmin objAdmin) {

            string sql = "select AdminName from Admins where LoginId={0} and LoginPwd='{1}'";

            sql = string.Format(sql, objAdmin.LoginId, objAdmin.LoginPwd);

            //从数据库中查询

            SqlDataReader objReader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            if (objReader.Read())

            {

                objAdmin.AdminName = objReader["AdminName"].ToString();

            }

            else {

                objAdmin = null;

            }

            objReader.Close();

            return objAdmin;

        }

 

       

        /// <summary>

        /// 修改管理员密码

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="newObjAdmin">封装了要修改的登录密码和登录账号的对象</param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public int ModifyAdminPwd(SysAdmin newObjAdmin) {

            string sql = "update Admins set LoginPwd='{0}' where LoginId={1}";

            sql = string.Format(sql, newObjAdmin.LoginPwd, newObjAdmin.LoginId);

            return SQLHelper.Update(sql);

        }

    }

}

ScoreListService类：

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    public class ScoreListService

    {

 

        #region 查询成绩

        /// <summary>

        /// 获取学员成绩详细信息

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="objScoreList"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public List<ScoreListExt> GetScoreList(params object []para) {

            string sql = "select Students.StudentId,StudentName,ClassName,CSharp,SQLServerDB  from Students inner join StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId  ";

            sql += "inner join ScoreList on Students.StudentId=ScoreList.StudentId";

            if(para.Length!=0){

                string ClassName = para[0].ToString();

                sql += "  where ClassName='" + ClassName + "'";

            }

            //操作数据库进行读取数据

            List<ScoreListExt> list = new List<ScoreListExt>();

            try

            {

                SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

                while(reader.Read()){

                    //对象封装

                    ScoreListExt objScore=new ScoreListExt();

                    objScore.StudentId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["StudentId"].ToString());

                    objScore.StudentName = reader["StudentName"].ToString();

                    objScore.ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString();

                   

                    objScore.Csharp = Convert.ToInt32(reader["CSharp"].ToString());

                    objScore.SQLServerDB = Convert.ToInt32(reader["SQLServerDB"].ToString());

                    

 

                    list.Add(objScore);

                  

                   

                }

                reader.Close();

            }

            catch (SqlException ex){

                throw new Exception("查询数据库出错，详细信息为:"+ex.Message);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                throw ex;

            }

            return list;

        }

 

        /// <summary>

        /// 获取学员成绩的统计信息

        /// </summary>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public Dictionary<string, string> GetScoreListInfo(params object[] para)

        {

            string sql = "select Count=count(*),CSharpAvg=avg(CSharp),DBAvg=avg(SQLServerDB) from ScoreList";

 

            if (para.Length != 0)

            {

                string ClassId = para[0].ToString();

                sql += "  where StudentId  in (select StudentId from Students where ClassId=" + ClassId + ")";

            }

            //两条sql语句拼接

            sql += ";select AttendCount=Count(*) from Students where StudentId not in (select StudentId from ScoreList)";

 

            if (para.Length != 0)

            {

                string ClassId = para[0].ToString();

                sql += "  and ClassId="+ClassId;

            }

 

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            Dictionary<string, string> scoreInfo =null;

            if(reader.Read()){

                scoreInfo = new Dictionary<string, string>();

                scoreInfo.Add("Count", reader["Count"].ToString());

                scoreInfo.Add("CSharpAvg", reader["CSharpAvg"].ToString());

                scoreInfo.Add("DBAvg", reader["DBAvg"].ToString());

            }

            if(reader.NextResult()){

                if(reader.Read()){

                    scoreInfo.Add("AttendCount", reader["AttendCount"].ToString());

                }

            }

            reader.Close();

            return scoreInfo;

        }

 

        /// <summary>

        /// 获取学员缺考的名单

        /// </summary>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public List<string> GetAttentStudentName(params object[] para)

        {

            string sql = "select StudentName from Students where StudentId not in (select StudentId from ScoreList)";

            if (para.Length != 0)

            {

                string ClassId = para[0].ToString();

                sql += "  and ClassId=" + ClassId;

            }

            List<string> AttendStuentName = new List<string>();

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            while(reader.Read()){

               

                AttendStuentName.Add(reader["StudentName"].ToString());

            }

            reader.Close();

 

            return AttendStuentName;

        }

 

 

 

        public List<ScoreListExt> GetScoreListByClassIdAndCharp(params object[] para)

        {

            string sql = "select Students.StudentId,StudentName,ClassName,CSharp,SQLServerDB from Students inner join StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId  ";

            sql += "inner join ScoreList on Students.StudentId=ScoreList.StudentId";

            if (para.Length ==1)

            {

                string ClassId = para[0].ToString();

                sql += "  where Students.ClassId=" + ClassId;

            }

            else if(para.Length==2){

                string ClassId = para[0].ToString();

                string Charp = para[1].ToString();

                sql += "  where Students.ClassId=" + ClassId;

                sql += " and  CSharp>" + Charp;

            }

            //操作数据库进行读取数据

            List<ScoreListExt> list = new List<ScoreListExt>();

            try

            {

                SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

                while (reader.Read())

                {

                    //对象封装

                    ScoreListExt objScore = new ScoreListExt();

                    objScore.StudentId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["StudentId"].ToString());

                    objScore.StudentName = reader["StudentName"].ToString();

                    objScore.ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString();

 

                    objScore.Csharp = Convert.ToInt32(reader["CSharp"].ToString());

                    objScore.SQLServerDB = Convert.ToInt32(reader["SQLServerDB"].ToString());

 

 

                    list.Add(objScore);

 

 

                }

                reader.Close();

            }

            catch (SqlException ex)

            {

                throw new Exception("查询数据库出错，详细信息为:" + ex.Message);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                throw ex;

            }

            return list;

        }

 

 

        public List<ScoreListExt> GetScoreListByCharp(params object[] para)

        {

            string sql = "select Students.StudentId,StudentName,ClassName,CSharp,SQLServerDB from Students inner join StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId  ";

            sql += "inner join ScoreList on Students.StudentId=ScoreList.StudentId";

            if (para.Length == 1)

                string Charp = para[0].ToString();

                sql += "  where CSharp>" + Charp;

            List<ScoreListExt> list = new List<ScoreListExt>();

                    ScoreListExt objScore = new ScoreListExt();

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Data;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 班级数据访问类

    /// </summary>

    public class StudentClassService

    {

        public List<StudentClass> GetAllClass() {

            string sql = "select ClassName,ClassId from StudentClass";

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            List<StudentClass> list = new List<StudentClass>();

            while(reader.Read()){

                StudentClass objStudentClass = new StudentClass();

                objStudentClass.ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString();

                objStudentClass.ClassId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["ClassId"].ToString());

                list.Add(objStudentClass);

            }

            reader.Close();

            return list;

        }

 

        public DataSet GetAllClases() {

            string sql = "select ClassName,ClassId from StudentClass";

            DataSet ds = null;

            try

            {

                ds = SQLHelper.GetDataSet(sql);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

               

                throw ex;

            }

            return ds;

        }

    }

}

 

 

StudentService类：

 

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Data.SqlClient;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

 

namespace DAL

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 学员信息数据访问类

    /// </summary>

    public class StudentService

    {

        #region 添加学员

        /// <summary>

        /// 判断当前身份证是否存在

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="studentIdNo"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public bool IsIdNoExisted(string studentIdNo)

        {

            string sql = "select count(*) from Students where StudentIdNo={0}";

            sql = string.Format(sql, studentIdNo);

            int result = Convert.ToInt32(SQLHelper.GetSingleResult(sql));

 

            if (result == 1)

            {

                return true;

            }

            else

            {

                return false;

            }

        }

        /// <summary>

        /// 添加学员

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="objstudent"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public int AddStudent(Student objStudent)

        {

            string sql = "insert into Students(StudentName,Gender,Birthday,StudentIdNo,Age,PhoneNumber,StudentAddress,CardNo,ClassId)  ";

            sql += "values('{0}','{1}','{2}','{3}',{4},'{5}','{6}','{7}',{8})";

            sql = string.Format(sql, objStudent.StudentName, objStudent.Gender, objStudent.Birthday,

               objStudent.StudentIdNo, objStudent.Age, objStudent.PhoneNumber,

               objStudent.StudentAddress, objStudent.CardNo, objStudent.ClassId);

            try

            {

                return SQLHelper.Update(sql);

            }

            catch (SqlException ex)

            {

                throw new Exception("数据库操作出错，具体信息:" + ex.Message);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                throw ex;

            }

 

 

        }

        #endregion

 

        #region 查询学员

        /// <summary>

        /// 根据班级名称查询学员信息

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="className"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public List<StudentExt> GetStudentByClass(string className)

        {

            string sql = "select StudentName,StudentId,Gender,Birthday,ClassName from Students  ";

            sql += "inner join StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId";

            sql += "  where ClassName='{0}'";

            sql = string.Format(sql, className);

 

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            List<StudentExt> list = new List<StudentExt>();

            while (reader.Read())

            {

                list.Add(new StudentExt()

                {

                    StudentName = reader["StudentName"].ToString(),

                    StudentId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["StudentId"].ToString()),

                    Gender = reader["Gender"].ToString(),

                    Birthday = Convert.ToDateTime(reader["Birthday"].ToString()),

                    ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString()

 

                });

            }

            reader.Close();

            return list;

        }

        /// <summary>

        /// 根据学号查询学员对象

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="studentId"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public StudentExt GetStudentById(string studentId) {

            string sql = "select StudentId,StudentName,Gender,Birthday,StudentIdNo,CardNo,PhoneNumber,StudentAddress,ClassName";

            sql += " from Students inner join  StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId where  ";

            sql += "StudentId={0}";

            sql = string.Format(sql,studentId);

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            StudentExt student = null;

            if(reader.Read()){

                 student = new StudentExt()

                {

                    StudentId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["StudentId"].ToString()),

                    StudentName=reader["StudentName"].ToString(),

                    Gender = reader["Gender"].ToString(),

                    Birthday = Convert.ToDateTime(reader["Birthday"].ToString()),

                    StudentIdNo = reader["StudentIdNo"].ToString(),

                    CardNo = reader["CardNo"].ToString(),

                    PhoneNumber = reader["PhoneNumber"].ToString(),

                    StudentAddress = reader["StudentAddress"].ToString(),

                    ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString()

                };

            }

            reader.Close();

            return student;

        }

 

 

        /// <summary>

        /// 根据卡号查询学员对象

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="CardNo"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public StudentExt GetStudentByCardNo(string CardNo)

        {

            string sql = "select StudentId,StudentName,Gender,Birthday,StudentIdNo,CardNo,PhoneNumber,StudentAddress,ClassName";

            sql += " from Students inner join  StudentClass on Students.ClassId=StudentClass.ClassId where  ";

            sql += "CardNo='{0}'";

            sql = string.Format(sql,CardNo);

            SqlDataReader reader = SQLHelper.GetReader(sql);

            StudentExt student = null;

            if (reader.Read())

            {

                student = new StudentExt()

                {

                    StudentId = Convert.ToInt32(reader["StudentId"].ToString()),

                    StudentName = reader["StudentName"].ToString(),

                    Gender = reader["Gender"].ToString(),

                    Birthday = Convert.ToDateTime(reader["Birthday"].ToString()),

                    StudentIdNo = reader["StudentIdNo"].ToString(),

                    CardNo = reader["CardNo"].ToString(),

                    PhoneNumber = reader["PhoneNumber"].ToString(),

                    StudentAddress = reader["StudentAddress"].ToString(),

                    ClassName = reader["ClassName"].ToString()

                };

            }

            reader.Close();

            return student;

        }

        #endregion

 

 

        #region 修改学员信息

        /// <summary>

        /// 修改学员时，判断学员信息是否与其他学员身份证号和学号重复

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="studentIdNo"></param>

        /// <param name="studentId"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public bool IsIdNoExisted(string studentIdNo,string studentId)

        {

            string sql = "select count(*) from Students where StudentIdNo={0} and StudentId<>{1}";

            sql = string.Format(sql, studentIdNo,studentId);

            int result = Convert.ToInt32(SQLHelper.GetSingleResult(sql));

 

            if (result==1)

            {

                return true;

            }

            else

            {

                return false;

            }

        }

        /// <summary>

        /// 修改学员对象

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="objStudent"></param>

        /// <returns></returns>

        public int ModifiStudent(Student objStudent) {

            StringBuilder sqlBuilder = new StringBuilder();

            sqlBuilder.Append("Update Students set StudentName='{0}',Gender='{1}',Birthday='{2}',");

            sqlBuilder.Append("StudentIdNo='{3}',Age={4},PhoneNumber='{5}',StudentAddress='{6}',CardNo='{7}',ClassId={8} ");

            sqlBuilder.Append(" where StudentId={9}");

            string sql = string.Format(sqlBuilder.ToString(),

                objStudent.StudentName, objStudent.Gender, objStudent.Birthday,

                objStudent.StudentIdNo, objStudent.Age, objStudent.PhoneNumber,

                objStudent.StudentAddress, objStudent.CardNo, objStudent.ClassId,

                objStudent.StudentId

                );

            try

            {

                return SQLHelper.Update(sql);

            }

            catch(SqlException ex){

                throw new Exception("数据库操作失败，详细信息为:"+ex.Message);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                throw ex;

            }

        }

        #endregion

 

 

        #region 删除学员

        public int DeleteStudentById(string studentId) {

            string sql = "delete from Students where StudentId="+studentId;

            try

            {

                return SQLHelper.Update(sql);

 

            }

            catch(SqlException ex){

                if(ex.Number==547){

                    throw new Exception("该学号被其它数据表引用，不能直接被删除");

                }

                else

                throw new Exception("数据库操作失败，详细信息为:"+ex.Message);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                throw ex;

            }

          

        }

        #endregion

    }

}

Program类：

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Linq;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

using System.Windows.Forms;

 

namespace StudentManager

{

    static class Program

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 应用程序的主入口点。

        /// </summary>

        [STAThread]

        static void Main()

        {

            Application.EnableVisualStyles();

            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);

            //创建登录窗体

            FrmUserLogin objFrmLogin = new FrmUserLogin();

            DialogResult result = objFrmLogin.ShowDialog();

 

            //判断登录是否成功

            if (result == DialogResult.OK)

            {

                Application.Run(new FrmMain());

                //Application.Run(new FrmStudentManager());

            }

            else

            {

                Application.Exit();  //退出整个程序

            }

           

        }

 

        //定义一个全局变量保持用户对象

        public static Models.SysAdmin objCurrentAdmin = null;

    }

}

 

 

登录界面业务逻辑 FrmUserLogin

using DAL;

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.ComponentModel;

using System.Data;

using System.Drawing;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

using System.Windows.Forms;

 

namespace StudentManager

{

    public partial class FrmUserLogin : Form

    {

        //创建数据访问类对象

        private SysAdminService objAdminService = new SysAdminService();

        public FrmUserLogin()

        {

            InitializeComponent();

        }

 

        private void btnLogin_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            //[1]数据验证

            if(this.txtLoginId.Text.Trim().Length==0){

                MessageBox.Show("请输入登录账号!","登录提示");

                this.txtLoginId.Focus();

                return;

            }

 

            if (this.txtLoginPwd.Text.Trim().Length == 0)

            {

                MessageBox.Show("请输入登录密码!", "登录提示");

                this.txtLoginPwd.Focus();

                return;

            }

 

            //[2]封装对象

            SysAdmin objAdmin = new SysAdmin() {

                LoginId=Convert.ToInt32(this.txtLoginId.Text.Trim()),

                LoginPwd=this.txtLoginPwd.Text.Trim()

            };

            //[3] 和后台交互,判断登录信息是否正确

            try

            {

                objAdmin=objAdminService.AdminLogin(objAdmin);

                if (objAdmin != null)

                { //登录成功

                    Program.objCurrentAdmin = objAdmin;

                    //设置登录窗体的返回值

                    this.DialogResult = DialogResult.OK;

                    //关闭窗体

                    this.Close();

                }

                else {

                    MessageBox.Show("登录账号或密码错误","登录提示");

                }

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                MessageBox.Show("数据访问出现异常,登录失败!具体原因："+ex.Message);

            }

        }

 

        #region 关闭窗口

        private void btnClose_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            this.Close();

        }

        #endregion

        //改善用户体验,在登录账户输入回车键跳转到密码框，使密码框获取焦点

        private void txtLoginId_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)

        {

           if(e.KeyValue==13){  //键盘按下回车键

               if (this.txtLoginId.Text.Trim().Length != 0)

               {

                   //密码框获取焦点

                   this.txtLoginPwd.Focus();

               }

           } 

        }

        //改善用户体验,输入完密码后按回车键代替点击登录按钮

        private void txtLoginPwd_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)

        {

            if(e.KeyValue==13){  //按下回车键

                btnLogin_Click(null, null);  //调用点击登录按钮事件函数

            }

        }

    }

}

 

 

 

主界面业务逻辑类  FrmMain

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.ComponentModel;

using System.Data;

using System.Drawing;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

添加学员界面业务逻辑 FrmAddStudent

using DAL;

using Models;

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.ComponentModel;

using System.Data;

using System.Drawing;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Threading.Tasks;

using System.Windows.Forms;

 

namespace StudentManager

{

    public partial class FrmAddStudent : Form

    {

        private StudentClassService objClassService = new StudentClassService();

        private StudentService objStudentService = new StudentService();

        public FrmAddStudent()

        {

            InitializeComponent();

            //初始化班级下拉框

            try

            {

                //绑定实体类对象集合

                this.cboClassName.DataSource = objClassService.GetAllClass();

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

 

                MessageBox.Show("操作失败,原因为:"+ex.Message);

            }

            //设置下拉框显示的值(实体类对象的那个属性对于的值,显示在前台的属性的值)

            this.cboClassName.DisplayMember = "ClassName";

            //设置下拉框的键(实体类对应的ID)

            this.cboClassName.ValueMember = "ClassId";

 

        }

 

        //窗体已经关闭

        private void FrmAddStudent_FormClosed(object sender, FormClosedEventArgs e)

        {

            //当窗体关闭时，将窗体对象清理掉

            FrmMain.objFrmAddStudent = null;

        }

 

        private void btnAdd_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            #region 数据验证

            if (this.txtStudentName.Text.Trim().Length == 0)

            {

                MessageBox.Show("学生姓名不能为空", "提示信息");

                return;

            }

            if(!this.rdoMale.Checked&&!this.rdoFemale.Checked){

                MessageBox.Show("请选择性别", "提示信息");

                return;

            }

 

            if (!StudentManager.DataValidate.IsIdentityCard(this.txtStudentIdNo.Text.Trim()))

            {

                MessageBox.Show("身份证不符合要求", "验证提示");

                return;

            }

            if(this.txtCardNo.Text.Trim().Length==0){

                MessageBox.Show("考勤卡号不能为空", "提示信息");

                return;

            }

 

            if(this.txtPhoneNumber.Text.Trim().Length==0){

                MessageBox.Show("请输入电话号码", "提示信息");

                return;

            }

            if(this.txtAddress.Text.Trim().Length==0){

                MessageBox.Show("请输入家庭地址", "提示信息");

                return;

            }

            //验证年龄是否小于18岁

            int age = DateTime.Now.Year - Convert.ToDateTime(this.dtpBirthday.Text.Trim()).Year;

            if (age < 18 || age > 35)

            {

                MessageBox.Show("学生年龄小于18岁或者大于35岁", "提示信息");

                return;

            }

 

            if(objStudentService.IsIdNoExisted(this.txtStudentIdNo.Text.Trim())){

                MessageBox.Show("身份证号不能和现有学员身份证号重复！", "验证提示");

                this.txtStudentIdNo.Focus();

                this.txtStudentIdNo.SelectAll();

                return;

            }

 

            #endregion

          

            #region 封装学生对象

            Student objStudent = new Student()

            {

                //StudentName = this.txtStudentName.Text.Trim(),

                //Gender=this.rdoMale.Checked? "男":"女",

                ////Birthday=Convert.ToDateTime(this.dtpBirthday.Text),

                //ClassId=Convert.ToInt32(this.cboClassName.SelectedValue),

                //StudentIdNo=this.txtStudentIdNo.Text.Trim(),

                //CardNo=this.txtCardNo.Text.Trim(),

                //PhoneNumber=this.txtPhoneNumbe.Text.Trim(),

                //StudentAddress=this.txtAddress.Text.Trim(),

                ////Age=DateTime.Now.Year-Convert.ToDateTime(this.dtpBirthday).Year

 

 

                StudentName = this.txtStudentName.Text.Trim(),

                Gender = this.rdoMale.Checked ? "男" : "女",

                Birthday = Convert.ToDateTime(this.dtpBirthday.Text),

                StudentIdNo = this.txtStudentIdNo.Text.Trim(),

                PhoneNumber = this.txtPhoneNumber.Text.Trim(),

                StudentAddress = this.txtAddress.Text.Trim(),

                CardNo = this.txtCardNo.Text.Trim(),

                ClassId = Convert.ToInt32(this.cboClassName.SelectedValue),//获取选择班级对应的ClassId

                Age = DateTime.Now.Year - Convert.ToDateTime(this.dtpBirthday.Text).Year

            };

 

            #endregion

 

            #region 调用后台方法添加数据

            try

            {

                if (objStudentService.AddStudent(objStudent) == 1)

                {

                    DialogResult result = MessageBox.Show("学员添加成功，是否继续添加？", "提示信息", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, MessageBoxIcon.Question);

                    if (result == DialogResult.Yes) //清空用户输入

                    {

                        this.rdoFemale.Checked = false;

                        this.rdoMale.Checked = false;

                        this.cboClassName.SelectedIndex = -1;

 

 

                        //清空文本框

                        foreach (Control item in this.Controls)

                        {

                            if(item is TextBox){

                                item.Text = "";

                            }

                        }

                        this.txtStudentName.Focus();

 

                    }

                    else {

                        this.Close();

                    }

                }

                else {

                    MessageBox.Show("添加失败");

                }

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                MessageBox.Show("数据库操作失败,原因为:"+ ex.Message);

               

            }

 

            #endregion

        }

        #region 关闭窗口

        //关闭窗口

        private void btnClose_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            this.Close();

        }

        #endregion

    }

}

代码如下：

//打卡窗体

        private void OpenForm(Form objForm) {

            objForm.TopLevel = false; //设置当前子窗体为非顶级对象

            objForm.WindowState = FormWindowState.Maximized;  //设置窗体最大化

            objForm.FormBorderStyle = FormBorderStyle.None;   //去掉边框

            objForm.Parent = this.panelForm;    //指定子窗体显示的容器

            objForm.Show();

        }

        //关闭容器中的所有窗体，并移除

        private void CloseForm() {

            foreach (Control item in this.panelForm.Controls)

            {

                if(item is Form){

                    Form objForm = (Form)item;

                    objForm.Close();

                    this.panelForm.Controls.Remove(item);

                }

            }

        }

          // tsbAddStudent按钮点击事件

        private void tsbAddStudent_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)

        {

            //先把容器中的窗体清空

            this.CloseForm();

            FrmAddStudent objAddStu = new FrmAddStudent();

            this.OpenForm(objAddStu);

           

        }

StudentExt扩展实体类

对象序列化的类:

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

 

//引入三个命名空间

using System.Runtime.Serialization;

using System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;

using System.IO;

 

namespace StudentManager

{

    public class SerializeObjectToString

    {

        //将Object类型对象(注：必须是可序列化的对象)转换为二进制序列字符串

        public string SerializeObject(object obj)

        {

            IFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();

            string result = string.Empty;

            using (MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream())

            {

                formatter.Serialize(stream, obj);

                byte[] byt = new byte[stream.Length];

                byt = stream.ToArray();

                //result = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(byt, 0, byt.Length);

                result = Convert.ToBase64String(byt);

                stream.Flush();

            }

            return result;

        }

        //将二进制序列字符串转换为Object类型对象

        public object DeserializeObject(string str)

        {

            IFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();

            //byte[] byt = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(str);

            byte[] byt = Convert.FromBase64String(str);

            object obj = null;

            using (Stream stream = new MemoryStream(byt, 0, byt.Length))

            {

                obj = formatter.Deserialize(stream);

            }

            return obj;

        }

    }

}

 

 

打印的类：

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

 

using System.Drawing;

using System.IO;

 

using Models;

using StudentManager;

using Office;

 

 

namespace ExcelPrint

{

    class PrintStudent

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 在Excel中打印学生信息

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="objStudent"></param>    

        /// <returns></returns>

        public void ExecutePrint(StudentExt objStudent)

        {

            //【1】定义一个Excel工作簿

            Excel.Application excelApp = new Excel.Application();

 

            //【2】获取已创建好的工作薄路径

            string excelBookPath = Environment.CurrentDirectory + "\\StudentInfo.xls";

            //【3】将现有工作簿加入已定义的工作簿集合

            excelApp.Workbooks.Add(excelBookPath);

            //【4】获取第1个工作表

            Excel.Worksheet objSheet = (Excel.Worksheet)excelApp.Worksheets[1];

 

            //【5】在当前的Excel中写入数据          

            if (objStudent.StuImage.Length != 0)

            { //将图片保存在指定的位置

                Image objImage = (Image)

                    new SerializeObjectToString().DeserializeObject(objStudent.StuImage);

                if (File.Exists(Environment.CurrentDirectory + "\\Student.jpg"))

                    File.Delete(Environment.CurrentDirectory + "\\Student.jpg");

                else

                {

                    //保存图片到系统目录（当前会保存在Debug或者Release文件夹中）

                    objImage.Save(Environment.CurrentDirectory + "\\Student.jpg");

                    //将图片插入的Excel中

                    objSheet.Shapes.AddPicture(Environment.CurrentDirectory +

                        "\\Student.jpg", MsoTriState.msoFalse,

                                            MsoTriState.msoTrue, 10, 50, 70, 80);//其中10,50,70,80分别为左、上、宽、高

                    //使用完毕后删除保存的图片

                    File.Delete(Environment.CurrentDirectory + "\\Student.jpg");

                }

            }

            //写入其他相关的数据 

            objSheet.Cells[4, 4] = objStudent.StudentId;//学号

            objSheet.Cells[4, 6] = objStudent.StudentName;//姓名

            objSheet.Cells[4, 8] = objStudent.Gender;//性别

            objSheet.Cells[6, 4] = objStudent.ClassName;//所在班级

            objSheet.Cells[6, 6] = objStudent.PhoneNumber ;//联系电话    

            objSheet.Cells[8, 4] = objStudent.StudentAddress;//家庭住址     

         

            //【6】打印预览

            excelApp.Visible = true;

            excelApp.Sheets.PrintPreview(true);

            //【7】释放对象

            excelApp.Quit();

            System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReleaseComObject(excelApp);//释放

            excelApp = null;

        }

    }

}

下一个(超市前台收银系统)

所使用的数据库

use master

go

if exists (select * from sysdatabases where name='SaleManagerDB')

drop database SaleManagerDB

go

create database SaleManagerDB

on primary

(

    name='SaleManagerDB_data',

    filename='D:\DB\SaleManagerDB_data.mdf',

    size=10MB,

    filegrowth=1MB

)

log on

(

    name='SaleManagerDB_log',

    filename='D:\DB\SaleManagerDB_log.ldf',

    size=2MB,

    filegrowth=1MB

)

go

 

use SaleManagerDB

go

--商品分类表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='ProductCategory')

drop table ProductCategory

go

create table ProductCategory

(

              CategoryId int identity(1,1) primary key ,--商品分类编号

              CategoryName varchar(20) not null--商品分类名称

)

go

--商品计量单位表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='ProductUnit')

drop table ProductUnit

go

create table ProductUnit

(

              Id int identity(1,1) primary key ,

              Unit varchar(20) not null--商品计量单位

)

go

--商品信息表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='Products')

drop table Products

go

create table Products

(

              ProductId varchar(50) primary key,--商品编号（商品条码）

              ProductName varchar(50) not null,

              UnitPrice numeric(5,2) not null,

              Unit varchar(50) not null,--计量单位（为了提高效率，该字段并没有使用外键）

              Discount int,--折扣

              CategoryId int  references ProductCategory (CategoryId) not null --（商品分类）外键

)

go

--商品库存状态

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='InventoryStatus')

drop table InventoryStatus

go

create table InventoryStatus

(            

    StatusId int primary key,--库存状态

    StatusDesc varchar(50) not null--（1：正常，-1：低于库存，2：高于库存；-2：已清仓）

)

go

--商品库存信息

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='ProductInventory')

drop table ProductInventory

go

create table ProductInventory

(

              ProductId varchar(50) primary key,--商品编号

    TotalCount int not null,--总数量

    MinCount int not null,--最小库存

    MaxCount int not null,--最大库存

    StatusId int references InventoryStatus (StatusId) --库存状态（1：正常，-1：低于库存，2：高于库存；-2：已清仓）

)

go

--销售员表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='SalesPerson')

drop table SalesPerson

go

create table SalesPerson

(

              SalesPersonId int identity(10000,1) primary key,-- 自动标识

              SPName varchar(50) not null,

              LoginPwd varchar(50)  not null --最少6位 

)

go

--销售流水账

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='SalesList')

drop table SalesList

go

create table SalesList

( 

              SerialNum varchar(50) primary key not null, --流水号(系统自动生成)

              TotalMoney numeric(10,2) not null,--购物总价钱

              RealReceive numeric(10,2) not null,--实际收款

              ReturnMoney  numeric(10,2) not null,--找零

              SalesPersonId int references SalesPerson (SalesPersonId), --销售员（外键）

              SaleDate smalldatetime  default(getdate()) not null --默认数据库服务器时间

)

go

--销售流水账明细

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='SalesListDetail')

drop table SalesListDetail

go

create table SalesListDetail

(

    Id int identity(1000000,1) primary key not  null,--自动标识列

    SerialNum varchar(50) references SalesList (SerialNum), --流水号（外键）

              ProductId varchar(50) not null, --商品编号（不需要外键）

              ProductName varchar(50) not null,

              UnitPrice numeric(10,2) not null,

              Discount int,--折扣

              Quantity int not null,--销售数量      

   SubTotalMoney numeric(10,2)--小计金额

)

go

--商品入库表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='ProductStorage')

drop table ProductStorage

go

create table ProductStorage

(

              StorageId int identity(100000,1) primary key,--标识列

              ProductId varchar(50) references Products (ProductId),--外键

              AddedCount int not null,--入库数量

              CurrentTime smalldatetime default(getdate())  not null --默认数据库服务器时间

)

go

--登录日志

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='LoginLogs')

drop table LoginLogs

go

create table LoginLogs

(

    LogId int identity(1,1) primary key,

              LoginId  int not null,

              SPName varchar(50),--登录人员姓名

              ServerName varchar(100),--登录的服务器名称

              LoginTime datetime default(getdate()) not null, --默认数据库服务器时间

              ExitTime datetime --退出时间

)

go

--超市会员表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='SMMembers')

drop table SMMembers

go

create table SMMembers

(

              MemberId int identity(100200300,1) primary key,--会员卡号

              MemberName varchar(50) not null,--会员姓名  

              Points int default(0) not null,--会员积分（消费10元，获得1个积分）

              PhoneNumber varchar(200) not null,--联系电话

              MemberAddress text not null,--联系地址

              OpenTime datetime default(getdate()),--开户时间

              MemberStatus int default(1) not null--会员卡状态（1：正常使用；0：冻结；-1：注销）

)

go

              LoginPwd varchar(20),--登录密码

              AdminName varchar(20),--管理员姓名

              AdminStatus bit, --当前状态（1：启用；0：禁用）

              RoleId int --角色编号（1：超级管理员；2：一般管理员）

)

事务的使用实例

SQLHelper类事务方法：

 /// <summary>

        /// 启用事务同时提交多条SQL语句

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="sqlList">sql语句集合</param>

        /// <returns>返回bool类型，代表执行是否成功</returns>

        public static bool UpdateByTran(List<string> sqlList) {

            SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString);

            SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand();

            cmd.Connection = conn;

            try

            {

                conn.Open();

                //开启事务

                cmd.Transaction = conn.BeginTransaction();

 

                foreach (string itemSql in sqlList)

                {

                    cmd.CommandText = itemSql;

                    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();

                }

                //提交数据

                cmd.Transaction.Commit();

                return true;

            }

            catch (SqlException ex)

            {

                //回滚

                if(cmd.Transaction!=null){

                    cmd.Transaction.Rollback(); //事务回滚

                }

                throw ex;

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

                throw ex;

            }

            finally {

                //清空事务

                if(cmd.Transaction!=null){

                    cmd.Transaction = null;

                }

                //关闭数据库

                conn.Close();

            }

        }

 

实体类：

/// <summary>

    /// 销售列表实体类

    /// </summary>

    [Serializable]

    public class SalesList

    {

        public string SerialNum { set; get; } //序列号

 

        public decimal TotalMoney { set; get; } //总金额

 

        public decimal RealReceive { set; get; } //实收金额

 

        public decimal ReturnMoney { set; get; } //找零

 

        public int SalesPersonId { set; get; } //销售员id

 

        public DateTime SaleDate { set; get; } //销售时间

 

        public List<SalesListDetail> ListDetail { set; get; }  //销售明细集合

    }

 

    /// <summary>

    /// 销售明细实体类

    /// </summary>

    [Serializable]

    public class SalesListDetail

    {

        public int Id { set; get; }

 

        public string SerialNum { set; get; } //序列化号

 

        public string ProductId { set; get; } //产品Id

 

        public string ProductName { set; get; } //产品名称

 

        public decimal UnitPrice { set; get; }  //单价

 

        public int Discount { set; get; } //折扣

 

        public int Quantity { set; get; } //商品数量

 

        public decimal SubTotalMoney { set; get; } //小计金额

 

 

}

 

 /// <summary>

    /// 会员实体类

    /// </summary>

    public class SMMembers

    {

        public int MemberId { set; get; } //会员编号

 

        public string MemberName { set; get; } //会员名称

 

        public int Points { set; get; }  //会员积分

 

        public string PhoneNumber { set; get; } //电话号码

 

        public string MemberAddress { set; get; } //地址

 

        public DateTime OpenTime { set; get; }  //开通时间

 

        public int MemberStatus { set; get; } //会员状态

    }

      

 

DAL数据访问层：ProductService类

 /// <summary>

        /// 启用事务提交购买商品对象、更新客户积分

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="objSaleList">商品销售对象</param>

        /// <param name="objMember">会员对象</param>

        /// <returns></returns>

 

        public bool SaveSaleInfo(SalesList objSaleList,SMMembers objMember) {

            //定义一个List集合，用于保存多条SQL语句

            List<string> sqlList = new List<string>();

            //[1]组合SQL语句(插入主表)

            string MainSql = "insert into SalesList(SerialNum, TotalMoney, RealReceive, ReturnMoney, SalesPersonId) values('{0}',{1},{2},{3},{4})";

            MainSql = string.Format(MainSql, objSaleList.SerialNum, objSaleList.TotalMoney, objSaleList.RealReceive,

                                    objSaleList.ReturnMoney, objSaleList.SalesPersonId);

            sqlList.Add(MainSql);

 

            //[2]组合SQL语句(插入明细表、更新库存)

            foreach (SalesListDetail item in objSaleList.ListDetail)

            {

                string detailSql = "insert into SalesListDetail(SerialNum, ProductId, ProductName, UnitPrice, Discount, Quantity, SubTotalMoney) ";

                detailSql += "values('{0}','{1}','{2}',{3},{4},{5},{6})";

                detailSql = string.Format(detailSql,item.SerialNum,item.ProductId,item.ProductName,item.UnitPrice,

                                        item.Discount,item.Quantity,item.SubTotalMoney

                                        );

                sqlList.Add(detailSql);

                //[3]更新库存的SQL语句

                string updateSql = "update ProductInventory set TotalCount=TotalCount-{0} where ProductId='{1}'";

                updateSql = string.Format(updateSql,item.Quantity,item.ProductId);

                sqlList.Add(updateSql);

            }

 

            //[4] 组合SQL语句 (更新客户积分)

            string pointSql = "update SMMembers set Points=Points+{0} where MemberId={1}";

            pointSql = string.Format(pointSql,objMember.Points,objMember.MemberId);

            sqlList.Add(pointSql);

 

            try

            {

                return SQLHelper.UpdateByTran(sqlList);

            }

            catch (Exception ex)

            {

               

                throw ex;

            }

           

        }

打印小票(直接调用打印机打印，没有打印预览效果)

实体类 Product

namespace Models

{

    /// <summary>

    /// 商品信息实体类

    /// </summary>

    [Serializable]

    public  class Product

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 商品编号

        /// </summary>

        public string  ProductId {set; get;}

        /// <summary>

        /// 商品名称

        /// </summary>

        public string ProductName {set;get;}

        /// <summary>

        /// 商品单价

        /// </summary>

        public decimal UnitPrice {set;get;}

        public string Unit {set;get;}

        /// <summary>

        /// 折扣

        /// </summary>

        public int Discount {set;get;}

        /// <summary>

        /// 商品分类id

        /// </summary>

        public int CategoryId { set; get; }

       

 

        ///扩展属性:供扫描商品的时候使用

 

        public int Num { get; set; }  //商品序号

        public int Quantity { get; set; } //购买数量

        public decimal SubTotal { get; set; } //小计金额

 

        //直接扩展

        public string CategoryName { set; get; } //商品分类名称

    }

}

 

 

打印类：

using System;

using System.Collections.Generic;

using System.Linq;

using System.Text;

using System.Drawing;

using Models;

 

namespace SMProject

{

    class USBPrint

    {

        /// <summary>

        /// 打印购物小票

        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="e"></param>

        /// <param name="list">需要循环打印的商品列表</param>

        /// <param name="serialNumber">流水号</param>

        /// <param name="salesperson">售货员</param>

        public static void Print(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e, List<Product> list,

            string serialNumber, string salesperson)

        {

            //生成票据

            float left = 2; //打印区域的左边界

            float top = 10;//打印区域的上边界

            Font titlefont = new Font("楷体_gb2312", 12);//标题字体

            Font font = new Font("仿宋", 8);//内容字体           

            e.Graphics.DrawString("   实惠到家超市", titlefont, Brushes.Blue, left + 10, top - 5, new StringFormat());//打印标题

            e.Graphics.DrawString("     购物凭证", titlefont, Brushes.Blue, left + 10, top + 15, new StringFormat());//打印标题

            //画一条分界线

            Pen pen = new Pen(Color.Green, 1);

            e.Graphics.DrawLine(pen, new Point((int)left - 2, (int)top + 35), new Point((int)left + (int)180, (int)top + 35));

            //打印内容标题

            decimal totalMoney = 0;//商品总计

            e.Graphics.DrawString("商品名称        单价    数量   金额", font, Brushes.Blue, left, top + titlefont.GetHeight(e.Graphics) + 12 + 12, new StringFormat());

            //循环打印商品清单

            for (int i = 1; i <= list.Count; i++)

            {

                totalMoney += list[i - 1].SubTotal;

                decimal unitPrice = list[i - 1].UnitPrice * Convert.ToDecimal(1.00);

                if (list[i - 1].Discount != 0)

                    unitPrice = unitPrice * list[i - 1].Discount / Convert.ToDecimal(10.00) * Convert.ToDecimal(1.00);

                //调整间距

                string sp1 = string.Empty;

                if (list[i - 1].ProductName.Length == 4)

                    sp1 = "        ";

                else if (list[i - 1].ProductName.Length == 3)

                    sp1 = "            ";

                else if (list[i - 1].ProductName.Length == 5)

                    sp1 = "    ";

 

                string sp2 = string.Empty;

                if (list[i - 1].UnitPrice.ToString().Length == 1)

                    sp2 = "         ";

                else if (list[i - 1].UnitPrice.ToString().Length == 2)

                    sp2 = "        ";

                else if (list[i - 1].UnitPrice.ToString().Length == 3)

                    sp2 = "       ";

                else if (list[i - 1].UnitPrice.ToString().Length == 4)

                    sp2 = "      ";

                else if (list[i - 1].UnitPrice.ToString().Length == 5)

                    sp2 = "     ";

                else if (list[i - 1].UnitPrice.ToString().Length == 6)

                    sp2 = "    ";

 

                string sp3 = string.Empty;

                if (list[i - 1].Quantity.ToString().Length == 1)

                    sp3 = "         ";

                else if (list[i - 1].Quantity.ToString().Length == 2)

                    sp3 = "       ";

                else if (list[i - 1].Quantity.ToString().Length == 3)

                    sp3 = "     ";

                e.Graphics.DrawString(list[i - 1].ProductName + sp1 + unitPrice + sp2 + list[i - 1].Quantity.ToString() + sp3 + list[i - 1].SubTotal.ToString(),

                    font, Brushes.Blue, left, top + titlefont.GetHeight(e.Graphics) + font.GetHeight(e.Graphics) * i + 12 + 12, new StringFormat());

            }

            //画一条分界线          

            e.Graphics.DrawLine(pen, new Point((int)left - 2, (int)top + 125), new Point((int)left + (int)180, (int)top + 125));

            //打印备注

            e.Graphics.DrawString("总计：  " + totalMoney * Convert.ToDecimal(1.00) + "  元", font, Brushes.Black, left, (int)top + 110 + 10 + 12, new StringFormat());

            e.Graphics.DrawString("流水号：" + serialNumber, font, Brushes.Black, left, (int)top + 110 + 10 + font.GetHeight(e.Graphics) * 2 + 12, new StringFormat());

            e.Graphics.DrawString("结算员：" + salesperson, font, Brushes.Black, left, (int)top + 110 + 10 + font.GetHeight(e.Graphics) * 3 + 12, new StringFormat());

            e.Graphics.DrawString("在7日内凭小票可开具购物发票", font, Brushes.Black, left, (int)top + 110 + 10 + font.GetHeight(e.Graphics) * 5 + 12, new StringFormat());

            e.Graphics.DrawString("            欢迎再次光临！", font, Brushes.Black, left, (int)top + 110 + 10 +  font.GetHeight(e.Graphics) * 7 + 12, new StringFormat());

 

        }

    }

}

 

 

3 在Winform页面拖拽PrintDocument控件到页面中，默认名字为printDocument1,在该控件中找到PrintPage事件，双击该事件，编辑如下：

private void printDocument1_PrintPage(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e)

{

         USBPrint.Print(e, productList, this.lblSerialNum.Text, Program.objCurrentSale.SPName);

}

 this.printDocument1.Print();

禁止多个客户端同时运行

思路：

在启动前，在任务管理器中查找当前应用程序的进程名称是否在任务管理器中所有应用进程名称列表中，如果有一个，则为当前启动的第一个，如果有两个或两个以上，则不允许再启动

代码：

//获取任何管理器中的所有进程

            Process[] processArray = Process.GetProcesses();

            int currentProcessCount = 0;  //当前进程的总数

            foreach (Process process in processArray)

            {

                if (process.ProcessName == Process.GetCurrentProcess().ProcessName) {

                    currentProcessCount += 1;

                }

            }

 

            if(currentProcessCount>1){

                MessageBox.Show("程序已经启动了，不能再启动了","启动提示");

                Application.Exit(); //已经启动多于1个了，就关闭

                return;

            }

 

 

商品入库业务逻辑

UI窗体

 

数据表

--商品库存信息

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='ProductInventory')

drop table ProductInventory

go

create table ProductInventory

(

              ProductId varchar(50) primary key,--商品编号

    TotalCount int not null,--总数量

    MinCount int not null,--最小库存

    MaxCount int not null,--最大库存

    StatusId int references InventoryStatus (StatusId) --库存状态（1：正常，-1：低于库存，2：高于库存；-2：已清仓）

)

go

 

 

--商品入库表

if exists (select * from sysobjects where name='ProductStorage')

drop table ProductStorage

go

create table ProductStorage

(

              StorageId int identity(100000,1) primary key,--标识列

              ProductId varchar(50) references Products (ProductId),--外键

              AddedCount int not null,--入库数量

              CurrentTime smalldatetime default(getdate())  not null --默认数据库服务器时间

)

go

 

 

 

我写的存储过程

if exists(select * from sysobjects where name='usp_ProductStorage')

drop procedure usp_ProductStorage

go

create procedure usp_ProductStorage

@ProductId varchar(50),

@AddedCount int

as

              declare @errorSum int

              declare @TotalCount int

              declare @MinCount int

              declare @MaxCount int

              set @errorSum=0     

              begin transaction

                            begin

                                         

                                          insert into ProductStorage(ProductId,AddedCount) values(@ProductId,@AddedCount)

                                set @errorSum=@errorSum+@@error

                                          update ProductInventory set TotalCount=TotalCount+@AddedCount where ProductId=@ProductId

                                          set @errorSum=@errorSum+@@error

                                          --库存状态（1：正常，-1：低于库存，2：高于库存；-2：已清仓）

                                          select @TotalCount=TotalCount,@MinCount=MinCount,@MaxCount=MaxCount from ProductInventory where

ProductId=@ProductId

                                          if(@TotalCount<@MinCount and @TotalCount>0)

                                                        begin

                                                                      update ProductInventory set StatusId=-1 where ProductId=@ProductId

                                                                      set @errorSum=@errorSum+@@error

                                                        end

                                          else if(@TotalCount>@MaxCount)

                                                        begin

                                                                      update ProductInventory set StatusId=2  where ProductId=@ProductId

                                                                      set @errorSum=@errorSum+@@error

                                                        end

                                          else if(@TotalCount=0)

                                                        begin

                                                                      update ProductInventory set StatusId=-2 where ProductId=@ProductId

                                                                      set @errorSum=@errorSum+@@error

                                                        end

                                          else

                                                        begin

                                                                      update ProductInventory set StatusId=1 where ProductId=@ProductId

                                                            set @errorSum=@errorSum+@@error

                                                        end

                                          if(@errorSum=0)

                                                        commit transaction

                                          else

                                                        rollback transaction

                            end

go

 

参考存储过程

 

 

 

多条件查询(视图应用)

UI界面如下图：

可以单独输入商品编码、商品名称、商品分类进行查询，也可以是他们其中的任何组合

 

我的实现方案：

不建立视图

1 当用户输入了产品编码后，把后面两个条件的内容清空，使用产品编码进行独立查询并显示

2 没有输入商品编码，输入了商品名称(可以是模糊不全的名称)，再看一下后面的条件是否选择，选择了，则把这两个查询条件作为查询条件进行查询，否则就是把商品名称作为查询条件

3 前面两个条件都没有输入，直接使用最后一个条件作为查询

 

方案不足：业务逻辑太过于复杂，代码过多，而且不灵活，如果再增加一个窗体，增加的窗体在该窗体的基础上再增加查询 最大库存和最小库存，那就会存在方法重载过多了，代码重复量过大

 

 

参考方案

在数据库那边编写视图如下：

--创建视图

if exists(select * from sysobjects where name='view_QueryInventoryInfo')

drop view view_QueryInventoryInfo

go

 

create view view_QueryInventoryInfo

as

              select Products.ProductId,ProductName,UnitPrice,Unit,Discount,TotalCount,MinCount,MaxCount,

              InventoryDesc=case

              when TotalCount>MaxCount then '已经满仓'

              when TotalCount<MinCount and TotalCount>0 then '需要进货'

              else '货存正常'

              end,CategoryName

              from Products

              inner join ProductInventory on ProductInventory.ProductId=Products.ProductId

              inner join ProductCategory on ProductCategory.CategoryId=Products.CategoryId

go

 

 

c#程序代码如下：

该方案的不足是：没有处理三个条件都有值得情况，不然当商品编码存在而会因为后面两个条件，本来有结果的变成没有结果了，当三个条件都有值时，使用商品编码查询，后面两个条件清空
